mapper.insert: insert into sys_sign_info ( sign_name, sign_num, sign_type, sign_author, sign_state, apply_causes, cre_time, upd_time )values( #{sign_name}, #{sign_num}, #{sign_type}, #{sign_author}, #{sign_state}, #{apply_causes}, now(), now() )
mapper.select:
select o.* from sys_sign_info o
order by ${_sql_order}
select sign_type_id sign_type,sign_type_name sign_name from sign_type order by sign_type_id
select sign_num from sys_sign_info where sign_state in (1,2)
